skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
text: When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds
After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Shouhou's Firepower in damage.

skills.name: Flagship Defense Airgroup (旗艦直掩隊)
text: During [Battle], if Allied Flagship receives damage, Shouhou will obtain a special [Airstrike] that deals 75% damage.If used or not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Cannot be used in Map Mode.

comment: Shouhou has a warm personality. Possibly as a result of her having experienced too much bad luck, she has no issues accepting unfair conditions.
